titleStmt.title: A proclamation of his Excellency: Tho. L. Fairfax, L. Gen. requiring all persons who have engaged for the King in the first or latter warres now in London, to depart the City, and ten miles distant therefrom, within twenty foure houres after the publication hereof. With a petition of the officers and souldiers, together with the wel-affected inhabitants in the Isle of Weight [sic], Portsmouth, and Hurst, presented to his Excellency. / Published by speciall command.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Turner, and are to be sold in the Old Bailey,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 11th 1648"; the 9 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
